mapper.select:
select
,
from problem where problem_id = #{problemId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and delete_flag=0
mapper.insert: insert into problem ( title, spj, source, in_date, time_limit, memory_limit, defunct, accepted, submit, solved, delete_flag, description, input, output, sample_input, sample_output, hint ) values ( #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{timeLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memoryLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 'N', 0, 0,0, 0, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{input,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{output,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{sampleInput,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{sampleOutput,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{hint,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

update problem
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spj = #{spj,jdbcType=CHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
in_date = #{inDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
time_limit = #{timeLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},

defunct = #{defunct,jdbcType=CHAR},
accepted = #{accepted,jdbcType=INTEGER},

sample_output = #{sampleOutput,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
hint = #{hint,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where problem_id = #{problemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: select count(*) from problem where delete_flag=0
SELECT *from problem where problem_id like '%${problemId}%' and delete_flag=0 limit #{startPos},#{pageSize}
select *from problem where title like '%${title}%' and delete_flag=0 limit #{startPos},#{pageSize}
select COUNT(*) from problem where title like '%${title}%' and delete_flag=0
